dt-example.title: Selection style to work with mobile devices
dt-example.info:
By default, the selections in the panes are optimised for standard desktops, i.e. ctrl+click adds to the list, and a single click deselects anything currently selected. While this is good for keyboard driven displays, it makes it impossible to select multiple items on a mobile device.
This example demonstrates how the selection style can be changed to allow easy use on those mobile devices.
